definitions.text: characterized by lightness and insubstantiality; as impalpable or intangible as air; - Thomas Carlyle
examples: figures light and aeriform come unlooked for and melt away

definitions.text: of or containing or dissolved in ether

examples: the supernal happiness of a quiet death

definitions.text: characterized by unusual lightness and delicacy
examples: this smallest and most ethereal of birds
